sidebar.title: Claude Code on Databricks
sidebar.placeholder: What do you want to do?
sidebar.autoSyncTooltip: Automatically sync changes back to Workspace on task completion
sidebar.permissionRequired: No access to workspace. Please grant permissions in Settings.

models.cannotChangeDuringSession: Model cannot be changed during an active session

patSection.title: Personal Access Token
patSection.scopeWarning: Why use a Personal Access Token?
patSection.scopeWarningDesc: The on-behalf-of-user authorization provided by Databricks Apps has limited scopes. A Personal Access Token (PAT) allows the Claude Agent to perform Databricks CLI operations with full access to your workspace.
patSection.hint: Your PAT is encrypted and stored securely. It will be used for Databricks CLI operations within the agent.
patSection.saveFailed: Failed to save Personal Access Token
patSection.deleteFailed: Failed to remove Personal Access Token
patSection.encryptionUnavailableDesc: The server is not configured to store encrypted tokens. Contact your administrator to enable this feature.

githubSection.title: GitHub Authentication
githubSection.connectHint: Connect your GitHub account to enable git operations (clone, push, pull) within the agent.
githubSection.connectedHint: Your GitHub account is connected. Git operations will use your GitHub credentials.
githubSection.oauthNotConfiguredDesc: GitHub OAuth is not configured on this server. Contact your administrator to set up GITHUB_CLIENT_ID and GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.
githubSection.encryptionUnavailableDesc: The server is not configured to store encrypted tokens. Contact your administrator to enable this feature.

appSettingsModal.title: Application Settings
appSettingsModal.spAuthNote: Service Principal credentials will be used because on-behalf-of-user authorization (OBO) does not provide sufficient scopes for Workspace file operations.
appSettingsModal.chooseAccessMethodDesc: On-behalf-of-user authorization (OBO) lacks the required scopes, so either "Use PAT" or "Grant permission to Service Principal" is required. SQL and Genie access uses the delegation token.
appSettingsModal.optionPatDesc: Register your PAT for full Databricks CLI access. All operations will be performed as you.
appSettingsModal.optionSpDesc: Grant the app's Service Principal access to your home folder.
appSettingsModal.spLimitGit: Git operations (clone, push, pull) will use Service Principal credentials
appSettingsModal.spLimitCommit: Git commits will be authored by the Service Principal, not you
appSettingsModal.spLimitCli: Some Databricks CLI operations may behave differently

settingsModal.title: Claude Code Settings Backup and Restore
settingsModal.autoBackupDescription: Automatically save Claude configuration (.claude directory) to <0>Workspace</0> on task completion.
settingsModal.claudeConfigSyncDescription: Automatically sync Claude configuration (.claude directory) to Databricks Workspace on task completion.

skillsModal.invalidVersion: Version must be in semantic versioning format (e.g., 1.0.0)

quickstartApps.title: Quickstart: Databricks Apps
quickstartApps.selectTemplate: Select a template to get started
quickstartApps.rateLimitError: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
quickstartApps.networkError: Failed to connect to GitHub. Please check your connection.
quickstartApps.workspacePathHint: The template will be cloned to this location
quickstartApps.alreadyExists: A folder with this name already exists
quickstartApps.initialMessage: I've cloned the "{{templateName}}" template for Databricks Apps development. Please use the /databricks-apps skill to help me get started with this app. First, explore the project structure and explain what this template provides, then help me customize and run it.
